query: SELECT country, COUNT(*) as asset_count, ROUND(SUM(capacityMw), 1) as total_mw, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT assetClassification) as classifications FROM projects WHERE country IS NOT NULL GROUP BY country ORDER BY asset_count DESC;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2Y9tmBp9czJ5zzF.root --database Zma8WcwtXEXyEaiSTraUQs --execute SELECT country, COUNT(*) as asset_count, ROUND(SUM(capacityMw), 1) as total_mw, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT assetClassification) as classifications FROM projects WHERE country IS NOT NULL GROUP BY country ORDER BY asset_count DESC;
